verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> (that is, <S%H9000>Edom<s%>).

<S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wives<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> <S%H5711>Adah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%> and the <S%H1323>granddaughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite;<s%>
also <S%H1315>Basemath,<s%> Ishmael's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth.<s%>
And <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and <S%H1315>Basemath<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%>

and <S%H173>Oholibamah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> and <S%H3281>Jalam<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

Then <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wives<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and his <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H929>cattle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7075>goods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7408>acquired<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to [another] <S%H776>land<s%> away from his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

For their <S%H7399>property<s%> had <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> for them to <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4033>where<s%> they <S%H4033>sojourned<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5375>sustain<s%> them <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of their <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>
So <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> is <S%H9000>Edom.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> then are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> the father of the <S%H1>Edomites<s%> in the <S%H9000>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H2022>Seir.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of Esau's <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5711>Adah,<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1315>Basemath.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> were <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho<s%> and <S%H1609>Gatam<s%> and <S%H7073>Kenaz.<s%>

And <S%H8555>Timna<s%> was a <S%H6370>concubine<s%> of Esau's <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5711>Adah.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel:<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> and <S%H4199>Mizzah.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1315>Basemath.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%> and the <S%H1323>granddaughter<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon:<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to Esau, <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> and <S%H3281>Jalam<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz,<s%> the first-born of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> are <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6825>Zepho,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%>

<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5711>Adah.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> Esau's <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4199>Mizzah.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1315>Basemath.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3281>Jalam,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from Esau's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> (that is, <S%H9000>Edom<s%>), and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H441>chiefs.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> the <S%H2752>Horite,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> and <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah,<s%>

and <S%H1787>Dishon<s%> and <S%H687>Ezer<s%> and <S%H1789>Dishan.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from the <S%H2752>Horites,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> were <S%H2752>Hori<s%> and <S%H1950>Hemam;<s%> and Lotan's <S%H269>sister<s%> was <S%H8555>Timna.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal:<s%> <S%H5935>Alvan<s%> and <S%H4506>Manahath<s%> and <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> <S%H8195>Shepho<s%> and <S%H208>Onam.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon:<s%> <S%H345>Aiah<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah<s%> â€“ he is the <S%H6034>Anah<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H3222>hot<s%> <S%H3222>springs<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> when he was <S%H7462>pasturing<s%> the <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> of his father <S%H1>Zibeon.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah:<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> and <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon:<s%> <S%H2533>Hemdan<s%> and <S%H790>Eshban<s%> and <S%H3506>Ithran<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer:<s%> <S%H1092>Bilhan<s%> and <S%H2190>Zaavan<s%> and <S%H6130>Akan.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan:<s%> <S%H5780>Uz<s%> and <S%H765>Aran.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from the <S%H2752>Horites:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6034>Anah,<s%>

<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H1789>Dishan.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from the <S%H2752>Horites,<s%> according to their [various] <S%H441>chiefs<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah.<s%>
Then <S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>
Then <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H8489>Temanites<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>

Then <S%H2367>Husham<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad,<s%> who <S%H5221>defeated<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5762>Avith.<s%>
Then <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> of <S%H4957>Masrekah<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>
Then <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> of <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%> on the [Euphrates] <S%H5104>River<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>
Then <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and Baal-hanan the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>

Then Baal-hanan the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1924>Hadar<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pau;<s%> and his wife's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Mezahab.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> descended from <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> [and] their <S%H4725>localities,<s%> by their <S%H8034>names:<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8555>Timna,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5933>Alvah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3509>Jetheth,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6373>Pinon,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4014>Mibzar,<s%>

<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4025>Magdiel,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5902>Iram.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> (that is, <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> the father of the <S%H1>Edomites<s%>), according to their <S%H9000>habitations<s%> in the <S%H4186>land<s%> of their <S%H776>possession.<s%>
